title: Did a member of the court force rape survivors to allow the rapist to visit their children?
subtitle: In June 2012, she asked for several news articles on the plight of Jessica Stalings and her children in Alabama.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In 2018 or 2019, a rape survivors ' court in Alabama called Jessica Stallings ordered her rapist to visit the children for whom she was born.
